message.content:
{"id": "21706", 
"title": "Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage", 
"description": "The BidiUtil class in the win32 module uses the Class.forName() method.",
"OB": "The BidiUtil class in the win32 module should have a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation, as there are no nonstatic methods in this class.",
"EB": "To improve the BidiUtil class in the win32 module, a private constructor should be added. Since there are no nonstatic methods in this class, having a private constructor will prevent unnecessary instantiation.",
"SR": "Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class in the win32 module to prevent unnecessary instantiation. Modify the class to have a private constructor and ensure that there are no nonstatic methods in the class."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '21706', 'title': 'Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage', 'description': 'Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "add a private constructor.There are no nonstatic methods in this class, soactually, this would be a good thing to do anyway.Might as well preventpeople from instantiating the class if there's no need to.You're not addingany size, because the compiler gives you a free public constructor anyway.You're just making the contructor private instead of public. ", 'SR': ''}
